channel.title: Shinysense on Live Free or Dichotomize
channel.description: Recent content in Shinysense on Live Free or Dichotomize

item.title: New and improved draw charts in shinysense
item.description: Background I didn’t expect many people to use the you-draw-it charts (henceforth refered to as ‘drawrs’) I put into my shiny modules package shinysense but a decent number did, and with that usage came… bugs. In an effort to fix the bugs I went back and tore the function down and re-wrote it entirely. This time utilizing the new javascript and R development knowledge I gained from building it the first time.
